name: Tapamomupotupumato
description:
Game for Mini Jam 110 - Sacrifice

Destruction is imminent, the forces of the world have collapsed.

Construction, destruction and balance. Together they maintained stability but the inhabitants forgot their prayers.

Now with the imminent death of the world The Nine Gods demand attention and the adepts have resumed their rituals.

Three times they have to say their names.

Three forces have to balance.

Three cults have to come together to ask

the God of Gods to save them.

All the assets for the game:

https://endorth.itch.io/tapamomupotupumato-assets

-- Endorth --
